lead_paragraph: Former Aston Villa captain Stiliyan Petrov, who retired from football after being diagnosed with acute leukaemia in 2012, wants to resume his playing career with the relegated Premier League club.

headline.print_headline: Petrov Plans Villa Comeback After Beating Leukaemia
headline.main: Petrov Plans Villa Comeback After Beating Leukaemia
